      • replaceUrlWithRouteParams

        public java.lang.String replaceUrlWithRouteParams(java.lang.String url,
                                         NameValuePair[] httpParams)
        Replaces all the parameter marked in the url with the right values. The parameters must be marked in the url with the sintax: {parameter_name). For example: http://api.akamon.com/../{param_1}/.../{param_2}
        Parameters:
        url - Invocation url
        httpParams - Params to performe the substitution
        Returns:
        Final valid url
